pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Ensemble Modeling using Random Machines // A novel ensemble method employing Support Vector Machines (SVMs) as base learners. This powerful ensemble model is designed for both classification (Ara A., et. al, 2021) doi:10.6339/21-JDS1014, and regression (Ara A., et. al, 2021) doi:10.1016/j.eswa.2022.117107 problems, offering versatility and robust performance across different datasets and compared with other consolidated methods as Random Forests (Maia M, et. al, 2021) doi:10.6339/21-JDS1025.
